title: PSA: If youre mid lane and your entire team is nothing but AD and tanks...

replies.body:
As Yasuo I can kill a full armor team if I'm ahead. I've laned against Malphites who built straight armor and won. Why would someone play full tank Malphite mid? I don't know, that's not fun at all for anyone. But it's not gonna stop me. 

Assuming Yasuo is ahead and a good Yasuo he should be fine. All that armor pen turns those tanks into butter if you can play correctly. 

Zed on the other hand I can't say really for sure. I figure he would struggle unless far ahead. But I can see him being able to kite out tanks.
Heard{{champion:33}} you {{champion:54}} talkin' {{champion:44}} shit {{champion:53}}

I'll be honest I've been seeing a lot of 5 AD comps lately, and picking Rammus jungle against them (when my team doesn't feed 0-3 before i'm lvl 6 in spite of my ganks that can barely patch the holes in the sinking ship), is practically freelo.

I'm just sad about the ALL AD ALL THE TIME craze because I've really been enjoying Jhin, and I wanted to play and maybe take him on as a serious champ, but I cannot in good conscience try him in mid competitively when I have to 'expect' my team to be triple adc as rote measure.
Don't worry, your team will usually feed so much that the game is unsalvageable before they even get a chance to build armor.
logged in to upvote

> [{quoted}](name=ClTRlS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5RWpBBko,comment-id=00130000,timestamp=2016-03-01T00:20:39.635+0000)
>
> Oh that won't be a problem. I just ban Yasuo if someone on my team pick interests him and we have too much AP.
> 
> no problem.

You are the reason I hover Bard regardless of my role.
And you are the reason why I hover Shaco when I want to support Bard.
and you are the reason why i love league <3
I hover {{champion:20}}, and encourage my premades to join me in the snowball chanting before we pick our actual champs.

And then complaining on the forums when tanks are unkillable 

{{champion:54}} {{item:3047}}  {{item:3075}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3068}}

{{champion:44}}{{item:1028}}{{item:1027}}{{item:3056}}{{item:2045}}{{item:3010}}{{item:2049}}{{item:3363}}

Your build is severely lacking in gems.
No fk you. *picks talon*
Where is my AP marksman ?
{{champion:268}}
{{champion:17}}
{{champion:69}}
{{champion:42}}

{{champion:432}} 

Thank me later.
My Bard support built rageblade last game. He went 6/0/10.
{{champion:432}} Bard does what Bard wants{{champion:432}}
It's ok guys, I'm going AP Zed!
No AP scaling? Time to *make* some AP scaling. {{item:3285}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3146}}

Get me a mage thats actually fun like Yasuo and good in the amount of situations he is and I will.


Until then I'll keep tilting you on the champion select screen by my champion choice.

{{champion:103}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:143}}{{champion:1}} 

Burst - Fizz, Leblanc, Syndra, Annie.
Outplay potential - Ahro, Ekko, Fizz, Leblanc, to an extent even Zyra.
Flash plays - Ahri, Ekko, Leblanc, maybe Fizz.
Hard CC - Ahri, very inconsistently ekko, Leblanc somewhat inconsistent, Syndra, Zyra, Annie.
 No more excuses.
Ahri, Ekko, Fizz, LB are the only ones that have outplay potential lol. I did say fun as well. ahri's almost fun, but fizz and LB? i'd rather learn how to actually be good at zed

Uhm..Leblanc is just FAR more rewarding than Zed. A good Leblanc is so frustrating to deal with if she was easier to play i would consider banning her. But few people can pull it off. All of those champions are fun to play to many people, i gave you options between utility, playmaking, and outplaying. You play Yasuo because you like Yasuo and feel like you have to 1v5, not because "there isnt other choices". Learn to be honest with yourself.
You're like the guy on the elevator who won't press 2 for the guy with a broken hand.
Squids don't have elbows, orangutan.

"Poopeater"

That's all I have to say.
Jesus you must really be a kid. Don't even bother replying you'll just dig your grave deeper.

I think I actually just contracted turbo-cancer from reading your comments. If you're 41 then please act your age, use a bit of grammar now and again, and don't just use the summoner spell icons in an attempt to make your points more graphic. All you accomplish is making yourself look like an idiot.

Sincerely, the 19 year old who makes you look like you have the same level of intellectual thought as an actual squid.

> [{quoted}](name=WadeWilson1337,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5RWpBBko,comment-id=000c0001,timestamp=2016-02-29T21:54:23.334+0000)
>{{champion:1}} 

Flashy plays/outplays include:

Literally flash-ulting.
"/all outplayed"
Or just stop picking Yasuo. Nobody wants to play with a bag of gold on their team.

I hate seeing this happen mainly because I'm a top laner. You know some days I like to play Gangplank
{{champion:157}} locks mid
{{champion:104}} goes jungle

or I could go Swain, he's a cool guy. Takes good care of his pets.

by all means, keep picking full AD teams! I am enjoying my freelo 

top: {{champion:54}} that tickles
jungle: {{champion:33}} kill yourself, _literally_
mid: {{champion:90}} I heard you like jumping on me zed, thats cute
adc: {{champion:22}} would be a shame if an adc had an instant stun
support: {{champion:111}} oh sorry you wanted to move?
the ultimate solution: annie.
Annie is the solution to all my problems. Go, Tibbers!
Good grief, I've played {{champion:42}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:60}} so many times because of these Zed and Yasuo~~ instalockers~~ mids.
It's okay, I was gonna pick Pantheon mid.
Tbh, id rather have pantheon mid over Yasuo, maybe not Zed depending on the matchup though. A good pantheon is hilarious to watch against some laners like TF.
If the the enemy doesn't have a true tank then having a full AD team comp is fine
